name: Little white lies
description:
One man, an AK-47, an abandoned arena/canyon, a kickass soundtrack and 10 waves of ferocious ...Rabbits.
What could possibly go wrong? Trust the UI. It tells you what enemies spawn next turn and it is 100% trustworthy... sometimes.

Controls:
LMB = shoot
R = Reload
Space = Jump (Infinitely)
W,A,S,D = Walk
Press 1 = toggle mouse cursor

Good luck, have fun :)
